parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided text.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly refers to the Partidul Social Democrat (PSD), a political party participating in the parliamentary elections.  While it doesn't name specific candidates, the association with the party is clear and directly relevant to the elections.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and its message is clearly intended to reach a wide audience in Alba County, not just specific individuals. The targeting parameters further support this.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The post highlights a policy proposal (tax exemption for pensions) by the PSD, aiming to present it as a beneficial measure for senior citizens. This directly influences voters' perception of the party and could sway their votes in favor of the PSD. The objective is clearly to garner electoral support.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post presents information about a policy proposal, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting. It's promotional in nature, focusing on the positive aspects of the PSD's proposal without presenting counterarguments or alternative perspectives.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post doesn't express a personal opinion; instead, it promotes a specific political party's policy, aiming to influence voters' choices.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1775434133288283</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by Media Smart SRL on behalf of PSD Alba, promotes a specific policy proposal by the PSD aimed at senior citizens in Alba County.  While not explicitly urging voters to vote for a specific candidate, the post's clear association with the PSD and its focus on a policy designed to attract voters strongly suggests an electoral objective. The targeting of the ad to a specific region and demographic further reinforces this.  The post's timing, within the electoral period, also contributes to its classification as electoral propaganda.  The lack of counterarguments or alternative perspectives, coupled with the positive framing of the PSD's proposal, leans away from journalistic objectivity.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Partidul Social Democrat (PSD)</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Media Smart SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 1775434133288283) care promovează o măsură a Partidului Social Democrat (PSD) referitoare la neimpozitarea pensiilor, cu scopul clar de a influența votul alegătorilor din județul Alba în favoarea PSD. Postarea, prin prezentarea unilaterală a măsurii ca fiind benefică, fără a prezenta perspective contrare sau informații complete, constituie propagandă electorală, având un efect electoral pozitiv pentru PSD.  Conținutul postării, vizibil pe link-ul https://www.facebook.com/ads/library/?active_status=active&ad_type=political_and_issue_ads&country=RO&is_targeted_country=false&media_type=all&q=PSD&search_type=keyword_unordered, demonstrează intenția de a influența votul în favoarea PSD.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
